QuestData.Title: Motes of Knowledge
QuestData.Description:
The creatures of Untamed Verdure are ingesting everything in sight. They have consumed our Compilation Nodule, and the Composition Motes needed for compilation. We Jiro require these resources.
This area is too hazardous for unprotected Jiro operation.
Please help us reclaim our resources. Mai Obet will assist you.
QuestData.LogDescription: $1oa Compilation Nodule and $2oa Composition Motes recovered.
QuestData.RewardText: You have recovered our resources. Your assistance is appreciated.
